metadata.Title: CVE-2023-34824 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: fdkaac before 1.0.5 was discovered to contain a heap buffer overflow in caf_info function in caf_reader.c.

notes.Note: sbeattie> fdkaac is a CLI utility based on libfdk-aac (src:fdk-aac).

criterions.comment: fdkaac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
